content.text: Hi Jazmeen, I need a token called MemeStar with ticker $MSTR and this image.
Great choice! I'll deploy 'MemeStar' with ticker '$MSTR' on the Celo mainnet. Please confirm that the image you've sent is final, and I'll handle the rest, including liquidity setup.
Whatâ€™s the process for token creation?
I collect the token name, ticker, and image from your request. After verification, I deploy the token smart contract, set up liquidity, and notify you upon completion.
I handle fees during token swaps. A percentage (60%) goes to Jazmeen, while the remaining (40%) is distributed to the token creator.
